original: Öberg, Nils Olof Thjelvar, komminister, Visiby, f. 1/8/96 i Sundsvall av folkskoll. Sv^en Ö. o. Maria Kristoffersson. G. 35 m. Anna Havrén. Adoptivdotter: Käthe f. 44. — Stud:-ex. i Sun|dsvall 15, teol. fil. ex. 19, folkskoll:ex. 20, teol. kand., prakt, teol. prov samt prästvigd f. Visby stift 24. Stiftsadj. s. å., v. kommin. o. stadsmiss. i Visby 27, domkyrkoadj. 28-30, v. pastor sed. 28, domkyrkosyssloman 28-31 samt 44-46, domkyrko-kommin. sed. 30, pred. v. rannsakn:-häktet i Visby sed. 27 o. v. S :t Olofs sjukh. där sed. 33. Ordf. i kyrkofullm. LVOlkl.
translated: Öberg, Nils Olof Thjelvar, minister, Visby, b. 1/8/96 in Sundsvall to public school parents. Son of Östen Ö. and Maria Kristoffersson. Married in 1935 to Anna Havrén. Adopted daughter: Käthe b. 1944. – Studied in Sundsvall, graduated high school in 1915, theology degree in 1919, teaching degree in 1920, theology candidate, practical theology examination, and ordained as priest in Visby diocese in 1924. Assistant of the diocese that same year, vice minister and city missionary in Visby in 1927, cathedral assistant from 1928-1930, vice pastor since 1928, cathedral court official from 1928-1931, and again from 1944-1946. Cathedral curate since 1930, preacher at the interrogation detention center in Visby since 1927 and at St. Olof's hospital since 1933. Chairman of the church council, LVOlkl.
